metadata.title: CVE-2019-1020001 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
yard before 0.9.20 allows path traversal.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-1020001` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

yard - 0.9.20-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yard package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.20-1').
